author: Reuters Editorial
title: China's Finance Ministry to regulate local govt', state firm financing
text:
BEIJING, March 30 (Reuters) - Chinaâ€™s Finance Ministry said on Friday state-owned financial firms cannot provide new loans for financing vehicles of local governments, in a further effort to regulate irregular financing activities undertaken by local governments and state firms.
Investment funds set up by state-owned financial firms and local governments also cannot ask for or receive guarantees on their loans, the ministry said in a statement posted on its website. (Reporting by Beijing Monitoring Desk Editing by Edmund Blair)
